com.isotrol.impe3.freemarker
Class AbstractFreeMarkerService

java.lang.Object
  com.isotrol.impe3.freemarker.AbstractFreeMarkerService
All Implemented Interfaces:
FreeMarkerService
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefaultFreeMarkerService
public abstract class AbstractFreeMarkerService
extends Object
implements FreeMarkerService

Skeletal class for implementations of the IMPE3 Interface to the freemarker templating engine.

Author:
Andres Rodriguez

Method Detail

getFragment

public HTMLFragment getFragment(String template,
                                RenderContext context,
                                Locale locale,
                                Object dataModel,
                                freemarker.template.ObjectWrapper wrapper)
Description copied from interface: FreeMarkerService
Encapsulate the processing of a FreeMarker template in a HTML fragment.

Specified by:
getFragment in interface FreeMarkerService
Parameters:
template - Template to process.
context - Component rendering context.
locale - Locale to use or null to use the locale provided by the render context.
dataModel - Data model to use as input.
wrapper - FreeMarker object wrapper to use.
Returns:
A HTML fragment encapsulating the processing of the template.
See Also:
FreeMarkerService.getFragment(java.lang.String, com.isotrol.impe3.api.component.RenderContext, java.util.Locale, java.lang.Object, freemarker.template.ObjectWrapper)
